about_the_game:
Factories of Golden Waters is a real time strategy and city building game that challenges you to run a profitable shipping and manufacturing industry. It is about business automation where you will build docks and transport materials to factories using the most efficient methods.

The seemingly dry, barren lands where you operate have a hidden treasure: the shimmering water. This rare compound can be extracted by specially engineered factories and turned into gold with simple materials.

Features


  • Optimize your delivery of resources by chaining multiple factories together.
  • Adjust your strategy by removing and replacing docks and waterways as needed.
  • Control the time flow to speed up or slow down the game.
  • Buy and place docks at the best locations for efficiency.
  • Draw waterways to connect factories and docks.
  • Guide the ships to and from the factories using different routes.
  • Buy resources for your factories to produce gold.
  • Review your performance in different aspects at the end of each session.
